meta.title: SnookerGame (SNR) - Exciting Web3 Snooker Game, Compete and Win Real Money

hero.heading: Play Snooker, Win Real Rewards!
hero.subheading: Use Your Skills, Get SNR Tokens Instantly
hero.description: Online snooker game on Web3 technology. Compete with real players, place bets, and receive rewards with SNR Tokens

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A Web3 snooker game that's easy to play, requires real skills, play anywhere anytime

easyToPlay.title: Easy to Play, Real Skills
easyToPlay.description: Control system designed to be easy to play, but requires skills and strategy like real snooker - including distance judgment, spin control, and planning ahead

turnBased.title: 180 Seconds Per Turn
turnBased.description: Each player has 3 minutes per turn to make their shot, keeping the game fast-paced and exciting

betting.title: Bet SNR and Win Rewards
betting.description: Use SNR Tokens to place bets and receive rewards when you win. Tokens can be withdrawn and exchanged for real money

opponents.title: Play Against Real Players or 5 Bot Levels
opponents.description: Choose to compete against real players or practice with AI Bots available in 5 difficulty levels, from beginner to professional

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Collection of standout features that make SnookerGame the best Web3 snooker game to play

betting.title: Real Betting with SNR Tokens
betting.description: Place bets in competitions and receive rewards in SNR Tokens that can be exchanged on Arbitrum DEX

nftCues.title: NFT Cues with Stats
nftCues.description: NFT cues with unique properties including accuracy, power, spin and more that affect gameplay

marketplace.title: Buy/Sell/Rent Marketplace
marketplace.description: Marketplace to buy, sell, rent, or upgrade Cue NFTs to improve performance and increase winning chances

aiBot.title: Play Against 5 AI Difficulty Levels
aiBot.description: Practice and test your skills against AI with 5 difficulty levels, from beginner to professional

freeClaim.title: Claim 1,000 SNR Free
freeClaim.description: Free claim system of 1,000 SNR for new players, limited to 2 million coins, start playing immediately without investment

tournaments.title: Tournaments, Ranking, Daily Quests
tournaments.description: Tournament competition system, player rankings, and daily quests for special rewards

specialEdition.title: Special Edition Cue
specialEdition.description: Special edition cue for early players, with extra stat bonuses and exclusive design

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: SnookerGame development plan from inception to full launch

earlyAccess.title: Join Us for Early Access
earlyAccess.description: You can be part of SnookerGame (SNR) development from the first phase, receive special benefits and opportunities for rare NFTs in the future

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about SnookerGame (SNR)

wallet.question: Do I need a Wallet?
wallet.answer: Yes, you need a Crypto Wallet like MetaMask to connect to SnookerGame, which will be used for receiving SNR Tokens, storing NFT cues, and performing transactions in the game

howToStart.question: How do I start playing?
howToStart.answer: Starting is easy with just 3 steps: 1) Connect your Wallet to the game 2) Claim free 1,000 SNR for new players 3) Start competing with other players or AI Bots

buyTokens.question: Do I need to buy Tokens?
buyTokens.answer: No need to buy initially, every new player can claim 1,000 SNR Tokens for free (limited to the first 2 million coins only) to start playing immediately

tokenValue.question: Does SNR have value?
tokenValue.answer: Yes, SNR Tokens have value and can be used in-game for betting, buying/selling NFTs, and more. They can also be traded on Arbitrum DEX

devices.question: What devices can I play on?
devices.answer: SnookerGame (SNR) can be played on PC, Mac, and mobile devices, both Android and iOS, through web browsers that support Web3 (such as Chrome or MetaMask app)

faq.moreQuestions: Still have questions? Contact us directly through the following channels

cta.title: Join SnookerGame Today
cta.description: Start playing and claim 1,000 SNR Tokens free immediately with the opportunity to receive special NFT cues only for early players
